alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 21 at 3:07PM MDT until October 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 8 to 14 inches possible across the eastern San Juan Mountains, with 4 to 9 inches possible across the La Garita and eastern Sawatch Mountains. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet, La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Snow and blowing blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
